titleStmt.title: A piththy [sic] note to Papists all and some that ioy in Feltons martirdome Desiring them to read this and to iudge not in spite at simple trust to grudge. Set foorth by one that knew his life, and was with him at the houre of his death, which was the viii. of August. Anno. 1570. at the west end of Paules Churche ouer against the Bishops gate, where he set vp the Bul.
titleStmt.author: Knell, Thomas.

titleStmt.title: A piththy [sic] note to Papists all and some that ioy in Feltons martirdome Desiring them to read this and to iudge not in spite at simple trust to grudge. Set foorth by one that knew his life, and was with him at the houre of his death, which was the viii. of August. Anno. 1570. at the west end of Paules Churche ouer against the Bishops gate, where he set vp the Bul.
titleStmt.author: Knell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: at the long shop adioyning vnto Saint Mildreds Church in the Pultrie the xxiii. of August by John Allde,

notesStmt.note: Signed at ed: T. Knell. Iuni.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
